params.name: action
params.description:
- addHeader
- addFooter
- addWatermark
- deletePages
- extractText
- getInfo
- merge
- open
- removePassword
- protect
- read
- removeWatermark
- setInfo
- thumbnail 
- write

**Note:**  action "thumbnail" was implemented from PDF Extension version - 1.1.0.8

params.name: ascending
params.description: Order in which the PDF files are sorted

params.name: type
params.description: used for action "extractText", defines the format type of the extraction, valid values are: string,xml

params.name: copyfrom
params.description: Pathname of the PDF document from which to use the first page as a watermark

params.name: ddxfile
params.description: Pathname of the DDX file, or a string with DDX instructions

params.name: destination
params.description: Pathname of the modified PDF document. If the destination file exists, you must set the overwrite attribute to yes. If the destination file does not exist, CFML creates the file, if the parent directory exists.

params.name: directory
params.description: Directory of the PDF documents to merge. You must specify either the directory attribute or the source attribute. If you specify the directory attribute, CFML orders the documents by filename in descending order, by default. To change the order of the files, use the order attribute.

params.name: encrypt
params.description: Encryption type for the PDF output file

params.name: flatten
params.description: Applies to forms created in Acrobat only (not forms created in LiveCycle); specifies whether interactivity is turned off

params.name: foreground
params.description: Placement of the watermark on the page

params.name: format
params.description: File type of thumbnail image output

params.name: image
params.description: Image used as a watermark. You can specify a pathname, a variable that contains an image file, or an image variable

params.name: imageprefix
params.description: prefix used for each image thumbnail file generated. The image filenames use the format: imagePrefix_page_n.format.

params.name: filter
params.description: file filter, used with attribute directory

params.name: info
params.description: Structure variable for relevant information

params.name: inputfiles
params.description: Structure that maps the PDF source files to the input variables in the DDX file, or a string of elements and their pathname.

params.name: isbase64
params.description: Valid only when the image attribute is specified. Specifies whether the image used as a watermark is in Base64 format

params.name: keepbookmark
params.description: Specifies whether bookmarks from the source PDF documents are retained in the merged document

params.name: name
params.description: PDF document variable name

params.name: newownerpassword
params.description: Password used to set permissions on a PDF document

params.name: newuserpassword
params.description: Password used to open PDF document

params.name: opacity
params.description: Opacity of the watermark. Valid values are integers in the range 0 (transparent) through 10 (opaque).

params.name: order
params.description: Order in which the PDF documents in the directory are merged

params.name: outputfiles
params.description: Structure that contains the output files in the DDX file or string as keys and the pathname to the result file as the value.

params.name: overwrite
params.description: Specifies whether PDF output overwrites the destination file

params.name: pages
params.description: Page or pages in the source PDF document on which to perform the action. You can specify multiple pages and page ranges as follows: "1,6-9,56-89,100, 110-120".

params.name: password
params.description: Owner or user password of the source PDF document, if the document is password-protected.

params.name: permissions
params.description: type of permissions on the PDF document

params.name: position
params.description: Position on the page where the watermark is placed. The position represents the top-left corner of the watermark. Specify the x and y coordinates; for example "50,30".

params.name: resolution
params.description: Image quality used to generate thumbnail images

params.name: rotation
params.description: Degree of rotation of the watermark image on the page.

params.name: saveoption
params.description: Save options for the PDF output

params.name: scale
params.description: Size of the thumbnail relative to the source page. The value represents a percentage from 1 through 100.

params.name: showonprint
params.description: Specify whether to print the watermark with the PDF document

params.name: source
params.description: PDF document used as the source.

params.name: stoponerror
params.description: Valid only if the directory attribute is specified. If the specified directory contains files other then readable PDF files, Lucee either stops merge process or continues.

params.name: transparent
params.description: (format="png" only) Specifies whether the image background is transparent or opaque

params.name: version
params.description: Version of the PDF used to write the document

params.name: text
params.description:
text for header or footer, you can add the following place holders within the text:

- _PAGELABEL: add current page label
- _LASTPAGELABEL: add last page label
- _PAGENUMBER: add current page number
- _LASTPAGENUMBER: add last page number

params.name: numberformat
params.description:
Specify the numbering format for PDF pages in the header/footer.
possible values are:

- LOWERCASEROMAN
- UPPERCASEROMAN
- NUMERIC

params.name: align
params.description:
Aligns the header and footer in PDF:

- left
- right
- center

params.name: leftmargin
params.description: left margin of the text in header/footer

params.name: rightmargin
params.description: right margin of the text in header/footer

params.name: topmargin
params.description: top margin of the text in header

params.name: bottommargin
params.description: bottom margin of the text in footer
